name: Sofia the Witch Curse of the Monster Moon Demo 1
name_original: Sofia the Witch Curse of the Monster Moon Demo 1
description:
Sofia the Witch Curse of the Monster Moon demo for Gameboy Color .

Every 500 years the stars alight with the lunar eclipse creating the fabled Monster Moon. This moon curses the land turning the animals into MONSTERS.

It's up to you save all your friends and remove the curse.

The demo allows you to play all levels in the Forest Land, and the first level of the other lands.

You can play the game in your browser or download and play on your gameboy colour, or analogue pocket.

Main Features still under development:

Boss Battles, I have some ideas but nothing created as of yet

Sound Effects, these are created by I'm waiting on an engine update before I can hook them up.

Thank you for playing.

Jake
